item.title: Video Games Are Over
item.description: Introduction: Modern video games are an industrialised product that satisfies checklists at the cost of a unique identity and product. They are deceptively marketted and maliciously monetized. Occasionally a video game will come out that is just trying to be a fun video game. These are few and far between. This is not a nostalgia post, modern video games are genuinely terrible. Why do they suck? The simple answer and the correct one is: money.
